title: Person of Interest S01E01 - Gang on the Subway
author: West
comment: Fucking love this scene. This show should have had a ten year run.

You know you've found a good show when you get that magical feeling, this scene was that feeling that made me love and start watching person of interest, I got a similar feeling with game of thrones, both good shows but sadly as the seasons stretch on and the plot comes to an end that feeling slowly shrivels up and dies and you see your best companion for months or years come to an end, it's depressing indeed and you feel like your shriveling up and dieing, to one of the best shows ever made.
Knock knock; the bowels of Hell have opened and out steps Mr. Reese. Finch: "What are you going to do John?" Reese: "I'm going to show him what a REAL monster looks like."
best show ever its got better and better this and the blacklist are must sees
This why you don't mess with hobos. Just leave them be.
description: John explains how he lost his girlfriend and ended up drinking and living on the street, He ends up being ridiculed by some punks and being ex military, he teaches them a lesson. However he is trying to lay low and off the map and this fight draws local laws attention.
